para.emphasis: New options for exporting object maps for the API

listitem.para: You can now export single names, or categories of names from the Object Mapping Editor for use in the API.
The developer manual now contains some information on using the converter to convert an ITE project to an API project.

para.emphasis: RCP tests now executed on Eclipse 4.4

listitem.para: We now execute our tests for RCP 4.x branches on version 4.4 of Eclipse.
